text: Mekong Review is a quarterly English-language literary magazine on Southeast Asian literature, especially Cambodian literature, Burmese literature, Vietnamese literature, Laotian literature, and Thai literature. It was founded by Minh Bui Jones, a Vietnamese-born Australian-based journalist, in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, and is based in Sydney, Australia. ==References== * * * ==External links== *mekongreview.com (official site) Category:English-language magazines Category:Literary magazines published in Australia Category:Literary translation magazines Category:Magazines established in 2015 Category:Magazines published in Sydney Category:Quarterly magazines published in Australia Category:Poetry literary magazines
title: Mekong Review
